Package application.snake

Class SnakeController

java.lang.Object
application.snake.SnakeController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CBSnakeController, SnakeDBController
public class SnakeController
extends java.lang.Object
This is the class that creates the Snake game page and contains its methods and attributes

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  SnakeController.Corner
    This method is used to create the game box surrounding the snake
    static class  SnakeController.Move
    Enums for moving the snake

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void initialize()
    This method starts the graphics of the snake game and place the starting snake
    static void newFood()
    This method is used to create a new food for the snake
    void start​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
    This method starts the game and creates a timeline to animated the snake
    void switchToGameMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method switches window to main menu when user clicks on the switchToGameMenu button Stops the animation for snake when user leaves
    void switchToSavePoint​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method saves the points accumulated in the snake game to the database to interact with the item shop when user clicks on the switchToSavePoint button Sends user to games menu and stops the animation for snake when user leaves
